channel.title: Food on Gabriel H. Brown
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Gabriel H. Brown

item.title: Traditional Chain Pizza Review
item.description: Hand Tossed / Traditional Pizza Review (Chain) A review of traditional style pizzas from national chains (specifically those in the Urbana, IL area) including: Domino’s, Jet’s, Little Ceasars, Papa John’s, and Pizza Hut. Domino’s standard/traditional pizza (top left) has a slightly doughy base with a golden, crisp bottom. At the crust, the dough is crisp on the outside while remaining soft and well inflated on the inside (and covered with a tasty garlic butter).

item.title: Deep Dish Chain Pizza Review
item.description: Deep Dish / Pan Pizza Review (Chain) A review of deep dish and pan style pizzas from national chains (specifically those in the Urbana, IL area) including: Domino’s, Jet’s, Little Ceasars, Papa John’s and Pizza Hut. Domino’s pan pizza (top left) is appropriately doughy with a crisp bottom and a crust that was almost indiscernible from the rest of the pizza. However, the bread/dough was alarmingly sweet as compared to the typical pizza experience.
